show._comment1: If enabled, xgridlines plot vertical lines in all plots at xticks positions.
show._comment2: total contribution plots two pie charts (positive and negative) showing the contribution of each current over the whole simulation.

current._comment1: is not set by default.  The current names should appear in the same order as in the currents argument. Is mandatory if ['show']['legend'] is true
current._comment2: if True, reorder currents with decreasing order of %.
current._comment3: if True, do not take into account ticks and ylim below.
current._comment4: only taken into account if autoscale_ticks_and_ylim is False
current._comment5: only taken into account if autoscale_ticks_and_ylim is False
current._comment7: True to plot absolute currents with stackplots, False to plot them with lines
current._comment8: thickness of black line separating the inward & outward stackplots. in %age of y size of plot.
current._comment9: only used if stackplot is True

currentscape._comment1: only used when legacy_method is true. if too low, white pixels can appear at the bottom of Currentscape plots because of rounding errors. Only used when use_legacy_method is True.

ions._comment1: if True, do not take into account ticks and ylim below.
ions._comment2: only taken into account if autoscale_ticks_and_ylim is False
ions._comment3: only taken into account if autoscale_ticks_and_ylim is False
ions._comment4: if True, reorder currents with decreasing order
ions._comment5: is not set by default.  The ions concentration names should appear in the same order as in the ions argument. Is mandatory if ['show']['legend'] is true

colormap.name: Set1
colormap._comment1: color number. Taken into account only if pattern use is True

stackplot._comment1: only used when ['currentscape']['legacy_method'] is true. data along x axis are summed up into chunks when pattern use is True. Put to 1 to disable.

pattern._comment1: since the pattern color is defined by the edgecolor, this parameter also changes the edgecolor of the pie charts

line._comment1: Is used when ['pattern']['use'] and ['show']['all_currents'] are True and ['current']['stackplot'] is False. Should have the same length as ['pattern']['patterns']

xaxis._comment1: if None, xticks are generated automatically. Can put a list of xticks to force custom xticks.

legend._comment1: 1. : top of legend is at the same level as top of Currentscape plot. higher value put legend higher in figure.
legend._comment2: forced to 0 if ['pattern']['use'] is False and ['current']['stackplot'] is False
